SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

net.sf.oval.constraint
Annotation Type MemberOf

@Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={FIELD,PARAMETER,METHOD})
@Constraint(checkWith=MemberOfCheck.class)
public @interface MemberOf

Check if the string representation is contained in the given string array.

Note: This constraint is also satisfied when the value to validate is null, therefore you might also need to specified @NotNull

Author:
Sebastian Thomschke

Required Element Summary
 String[] value
           
 
Optional Element Summary
 String errorCode
          error code passed to the ConstraintViolation object
 boolean ignoreCase
           
 String message
          message to be used for the ContraintsViolatedException
 String[] profiles
          The associated constraint profiles.
 int severity
          severity passed to the ConstraintViolation object
